attributes.action: Allow more immigrants into the UK.
attributes.additional_details: The UK government do not need to prevent  immigrants from entering the UK. We must note close all borders, and must not prevent more immigrants from entering Britain. Foreign citizens aren't taking all our benefits or costing the government millions. None of them are trying to change UK into a Muslim country.
attributes.background: This is a direct response to the hateful misinformation of the "stop allowing immigrants into the UK" petition. We need immigrants, their skills, their life, their vibrancy and culture.
